main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[usp_GetDTQueryByReportCell] Script Date: 07/03/2012 13:06:16 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_GetDTQueryByReportCell]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetDTQueryByReportCell] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL =' CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetDTQueryByReportCell] @DimName nvarchar(200), @MeasureName nvarchar(200), @DTActionTypeCode nvarchar(200)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
select Q.* from tblDrillThroughQueryReportCell C inner join tblDrillThroughQuery Q on C.DrillThroughQueryId = Q.DTQueryID where C.DimensionName = @DimName and C.MeasureName = @MeasureName and C.ActionTypeCode = @DTActionTypeCode and C.IsEnabled = 1'
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
